title: In the interest of the general development of any area, the Commissioner may require the means of access to be of larger width than that required under these Regulations
clause_text: In the interest of the general development of any area, the Commissioner may require the means of access to be of larger width than that required under these Regulations.
section: Larger width of Means of Access-
